statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, stock_level, demand_data FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' AND stock_level < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM inventory_management WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(demand_data, '$.weekly_demand') > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(demand_data, '$.category')) AS category FROM inventory_management WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(demand_data, '{"category":"new"}');

SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, JSON_EXTRACT(demand_data, '$.recommended_price') AS recommended_price FROM inventory_management WHERE stock_level < 20 AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(demand_data, '$.season')) = 'winter';
SELECT * FROM stock_levels
SELECT product_id, stock_quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT id, last_updated FROM stock_levels ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT id, demand_quantity, demand_date FROM demand_data WHERE demand_quantity < 50 ORDER BY demand_date
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(stock_quantity) AS total_stock FROM stock_levels GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_stock DESC
SELECT demand_date, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM demand_data GROUP BY demand_date ORDER BY demand_date ASC

SELECT stock_levels.product_id, stock_levels.stock_quantity, demand_data.demand_quantity FROM stock_levels INNER JOIN demand_data ON stock_levels.product_id = demand_data.product_id WHERE stock_levels.stock_quantity > demand_data.demand_quantity ORDER BY stock_levels.product_id ASC

SELECT stock_levels.product_id, stock_levels.stock_quantity, demand_data.demand_quantity, demand_data.demand_date FROM stock_levels LEFT JOIN demand_data ON stock_levels.product_id = demand_data.product_id ORDER BY stock_levels.product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM StockLevels;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM StockLevels WHERE current_stock > 50;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_update_date FROM StockLevels ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, last_update_date FROM StockLevels WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock, reorder_quantity FROM InventoryAnalysis;
SELECT * FROM StockLevels WHERE product_name = 'Product1';
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM StockLevels ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, last_update_date FROM StockLevels WHERE current_stock < 50 AND last_update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM StockLevels GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock FROM InventoryAnalysis WHERE reorder_quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, max_stock_level FROM stock_levels WHERE min_stock_level < 50;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM stock_levels);
SELECT * FROM demand_data ORDER BY demand_level DESC, demand_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, forecasted_demand, demand_date FROM demand_data WHERE forecasted_demand > demand_level;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM demand_data WHERE demand_level > forecasted_demand;
SELECT product_name, demand_level, forecasted_demand FROM demand_data ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, analysis_date, restock_recommendation FROM inventory_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT location_name, warehouse_capacity FROM warehouse_locations ORDER BY warehouse_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryData;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT demand_quantity, demand_date FROM DemandData WHERE product_id=1001;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT analysis_description, recommendation FROM AnalysisResults WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, product_name, stock_level, demand_data FROM InventoryData ORDER BY product_name DESC, stock_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM InventoryData WHERE stock_level > 100 AND demand_data < 500 ORDER BY stock_level DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM ProductDetails WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_description FROM AnalysisResults WHERE recommendation = 'High Priority' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, analysis_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT demand_date, demand_quantity FROM DemandData WHERE demand_quantity > 200 ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC, demand_date ASC LIMIT 5;
